description: This file defines a top navigation component for a web application built with LightningJS. It includes navigation buttons, a skip link for accessibility, and a search bar component. The component manages focus state and supports keyboard navigation and ARIA roles for accessibility.

classes.name: TopNav
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the top navigation bar with accessibility features, navigation links, and a search bar.

methods.name: $isFocused
methods.description: Checks if a navigation item at a given index is focused for visual highlighting.

methods.name: setFocusIndex
methods.description: Updates the focus index within the range of available navigation items.

methods.name: goActive
methods.description: Navigates to the route of the currently focused navigation item.

methods.name: $skipToContent
methods.description: Focuses the main content area for accessibility when the skip link is activated.
